name: Draw Love
description:
Try your best to put the ball in to the U by drawing lines and quickly changing the direction of gravity. This exceptional physics drop ball 2017 game very hard puzzle game but don't be panic be focused and become a king of these physics puzzle games. Play this epic physics drop game and show your mental abilities and feel the realistic experience and have fun with physics experiments puzzle game 3d. You will get different puzzles in one game so complete every level and become a real puzzles hard game master.
Game Play:
Draw different lines, objects and try to fall the ball in the U.
Balls, objects and all the lines react to the gravity law.
Change the gravity any time and don't trap the ball.
Don't stuck the ball. Restart the game if you get stuck.
You have a great chance to test your mind skills by playing this astonishing game and practice physics in a very unique and fun way. So install this beauty game now and enjoy.
